str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am acted upon in a certain way, either good or bad; I experience ill treatment, suffer.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.
A thief. From klepto; a stealer.

Doing evil; subst: an evil-doer. From kakos and poieo; a bad-doer;, a criminal.

Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
From allotrios and episkopos; overseeing others' affairs, i.e. A meddler.
